section.section: In this section, "license" means any grant of authority to an individual to practice an occupation or profession.
"License" includes a certificate, permit, or registration.

text.section: This section does not apply to licenses issued under Title 11, Subtitles 5 and 6 of the Financial Institutions Article.

A unit in the Department that is authorized to issue a license may allow an individual licensee who is a member of an armed force deployed outside the State to:
renew the license after the expiration of the renewal period without payment of a penalty or reinstatement fee if the late renewal is a direct result of the deployment; and
complete any continuing education or continuing competency requirements for renewal within a reasonable time after renewing the license.
